message: Let's make a deal. I believe a 60/40 split is fair for a starting point, considering we both lose if we don't reach an agreement.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, as we both need to agree quickly to avoid losing money.
Bob, time is running out and we both lose with inaction.  I'm increasing my offer to show flexibility, but I need you to meet me halfway. This is my final offer.
Alice, we're losing money with every round.  I'm willing to meet you halfway on your last offer, but I need a commitment to end this.  Let's split it 40/60.
